sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT REC_FIELD_NO, REC_FIELD_NAME FROM REC_FIELD
SELECT DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS career_div_name, DETAIL_CODE AS career_div_code FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'CAREER_DIV'
SELECT DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS check_res_name, DETAIL_CODE AS check_res_code FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'CHECK_RES'
